title: Stock Market Falls Ahead of Alphabet, Microsoft Earnings - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Stock Market Falls Ahead of Alphabet, Microsoft Earnings  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Nasdaq loses nearly 4%, hits fresh low for 2022  CNBC
  3. Stocks Fall Ahead of Earnings From Big Tech Companies  U.S. News & World Report
  4. Dow drops 700 points, Nasdaq slumps ahead of megacap tech earnings  MarketWatch
  5. US tech stocks drop ahead of Microsoft and Alphabet earnings  Financial Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Dow industrials lost more than 700 points ahead of a wave of earnings reports from major technology and blue-chip firms.
